name: roman

Roman letters are in the ordinary style of printed writing in which the letters are vertical.

the ordinary style of printed writing in which the letters are vertical: In this book, definitions are printed in roman. The text is typeset in roman, italics, and small caps.
More examplesFewer examplesType "D" in boldface roman.The text defaults to roman.The next important edition of Chaucer was the first to be printed in roman .
